description: Table T(n,k) by antidiagonals of exponent of largest power of k-th prime which divides n.
formula: T(n, k) = log(A060176(n, k))/log(A000040(k)) = k-th digit from right of A054841(n).
example: a(12,1) = 2 since 4 = 2^2 = p_1^2 divides 12 but 8 = 2^3 does not.a(12,2) = 1 since 3 = p_2 divides 12 but 9 = 3^2 does not.See also examples in A249344, which is transpose of this array.
prog: (Scheme)(define (A060175 n) (A249344bi (A004736 n) (A002260 n)))(define (A249344bi row col) (let ((p (A000040 row))) (let loop ((n col) (i 0)) (cond ((not (zero? (modulo n p))) i) (else (loop (/ n p) (+ i 1)))))));; _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 28 2014
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 14 2001
extensions: Erroneous example corrected and more terms computed by _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 28 2014
